Sentencas: Pr2NiO4+delta-based (Ruddlesden-Popper) perovskite-structured oxide materials are promising candidates for low and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) systems.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: In this study, we prepared a high-performance cubic-fluorite/perovskite heterostructure Pr6O11-Pr1.2Sr0.8NiO4+delta (PO-PSNO) cathode for intermediate temperature SOFCs by solution impregnation method.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: By changing the impregnation amount of Pr6O11, the micro-morphology of the heterostructure was regulated, so that the heterostructure interface had the best reactive site.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: The oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) performance of Pr1.2Sr0.8NiO4+delta is improved, and the content of surface Sr in the heterostructure electrode material is reduced.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: Our results indicate that the synergistic effect of PO particles and PSNO skeleton makes the heterostructure exhibit a high oxygen surface exchange properties and catalytic performance.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: When the impregnation amount of PO particles reaches about 10% of the PSNO skeleton, the heterostructure has the best ORR activity.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: The oxygen surface exchange coefficient (K-chem) of 2-PO-PSNO is 5.8 x 10(-4) cm center dot s(-1), being 1.45 times as that of PSNO at 750 degrees
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: C. Meanwhile, the polarization impedance (R-p) of 2PO-PSNO is reduced by 66% to only 0.114 Omega cm(2).
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure

Sentencas: Our study provides a new approach for developing high-performance RP structured perovskite cathodes and demonstrates practical applications in the field of SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction activity of SOFC cathode via construct a cubic fluorite/perovskite heterostructure
